item.title: 2021 Goals
item.description: Ship 1 side project that makes money Write 12 blog posts Gives at least 2 public talks Buffer’s product teams adopting SRE Figure out a system that helps to work a strict 4 days per week Clean High Pull Ups 5 Handstand Push Ups (I can’t handstand) Achieve the Full Planche (I can barely Tucked Planche now) 10 seconds Front Lever
